computer.description:
The Decision 1 is one of the last S-100 BUS based computer generation. Morrow Designs held it as the most flexible of all.
On top of a classical CP/M 2.2 operating system, it also featured a special 8 bits version of Unix called Micronix, which allowed the compilation of many programs written in C for other machines under Unix.
The Decision 1Â’s multi user version allowed to manage up to 15 users and 20 simultaneous tasks. According to Morrow Designs, testing confirmed the Decision 1 was faster than any competing system based on 16 bits 68000 microprocessors. _______________________
computer.name: Decision 1
computer.ports: 14 x S-100 slots, 3 x serial and 2 x parallel ports
